@GretaThunberg Pick up the Guardian today to read the first, supersized and packed edition of Saturday.

Plus, you can get the Guardian, and the new Saturday magazine, for half price for six weeks when you register for a voucher.

@GretaThunberg Of course, you’ll also be able to enjoy our agenda-setting literary coverage. Saturday’s Books section will contain reviews, extracts, interviews, new columns and longstanding favourites.

@GretaThunberg Don’t worry, we haven’t touched Blind date or the Quiz. Those will remain alongside much-loved columns like Experience and Q&A. Find all this packed together with the very best features, long reads and interviews, plus TV listings in a separate, pull out supplement.

@GretaThunberg In other brand new features we’ll be aiming to bridge Britain’s political differences one meal at a time in Dining across the divide and we’ll also be asking readers to weigh in on the most pressing domestic issues of our age in You be the judge.

@GretaThunberg In Lifestyle, we’ve reinvented how we cover shopping, fashion, beauty and travel in a sustainable but stylish way. 
 
Our new column Buy it / Rent it / Thrift it offers alternative ways to shop and stars will be taking us back to their childhood in a way we’ve never seen before.

@GretaThunberg Saturday’s Culture section is bursting with original ideas, from a cultural prescription to get you through the week to the music that stars really listen to. Plus! All the week’s need-to-know recommendations from podcasts to poetry.
